title: How many pages is a 650-word essay? - Quora

response.answer_text: The answer is one page single spaced or two pages double spaced. Now, depending on how you’ve set up your document your page count may vary slightly, but with Arial o Times New Roman 12 point font and conventional margins you should see similar results. 650 word essay are very common throughout middle and senior high school English curriculum, especially as book report, or summaries of current events. You can easily check page count in Microsoft Word and Google Docs. Order good essay from services below:

If you are using Times New Roman, 12 point font, and the essay is double-spaced with one inch margins (typical university essay settings), you will be looking at a little over two pages, perhaps 2.5 pages (aside from your references/works cited on another page which doesn’t count towards your word count). You can basically estimate that you will get anywhere from 250–275 words per page dependent on the length of your words and number of paragraphs.
